duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify qualified prospects and navigate company structures to identify decision-makers.
Generate appointments by means of proactive outbound prospecting and nurture leads through various outreach mechanisms.
Work closely with the Field Marketing team to identify various events, build a strategy for engagement, and demonstrate Whatfix capabilities.
Manage relationships with CXOs and top executives at various events, demonstrating the Whatfix demo to prospective customers and conveying the value and ROI.
Tie up leads that will turn into business through persistence and teach strong selling and influencing skills.
Serve as a brand ambassador for Whatfix, showcasing solutions and fostering valuable connections at physical and virtual events.
Engage event attendees in meaningful conversations, skillfully qualifying leads and driving traffic to maximize booth presence.
Coordinate with remote teams to streamline lead management and provide valuable insights to optimize lead generation strategies.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years prior new business sales experience in SaaS
